project_descr: Strengthening Community Resilience to Climate-induced disasters in the Dili to Ainaro Road Development Corridor, Timor-Leste.

outputs.output_descr: The DARDC comprises a joint investment by the Gov of TL and the WB to upgrade and strengthen the climate resilience of the road infrastructure linking Dili to the capitals of Aileu and Ainaro Districts.
